description: cAdvisor (Container Advisor) provides container users an understanding of the resource usage and performance characteristics of their running containers. It is a running daemon that collects
column6: and exports information about running containers. Specifically
column7: for each container it keeps resource isolation parameters
column9: histograms of complete historical resource usage and network statistics. This data is exported by container and machine-wide.  cAdvisor has native support for Docker containers and should support just about any other container type out of the bo
